inn1.comm: bowls it down the leg side first up
short of length, on the stumps this time, curves in a little, defended towards the leg side
drifts on to the pads, Tamim tucks it straight to square leg
short of length on the off-stump line, Tamim gets squared up a bit and plays it towards the off side
on the pads again, that hits the pads and goes down to the fine-leg fielder
length ball outside off, goes a touch away, left alone by Anamul
short of length delivery, just outside off, Anamul stays back to defend but the ball leaves him at the last moment
starts of with a short of length delivery on the middle stump, defended off the back foot
length ball on the off stump, Tamim comes forward and drives it to mid-off
length ball, going across Tamim, but that comes in a touch after pitching, left alone
some width provided and Tamim latches on to it, he slashes it hard and the ball goes one bounce to third-man
back of length ball on the off stump, Anamul opens the face to run it down to third-man
fuller length and Tamim just times it through the covers for the first boundary of the day
short of length on off stump, defended towards the off side off the back foot
bowls a length ball outside off, and Anamul gets beaten as he goes for the drive
very wide, starts round about the wide-marker, swings further away
short of length outside off, swings away from the batsman, left alone easily
fuller delivery outside off, Anamul drives it to mid-off from the crease
length ball outside off, swings away a touch, the batsman comes forward and shoulders arms
the bowler keeps probing outside the off stump, Anamul leaves again

caught at deep square leg! What a big blow is that? It was a short ball around the off stump and Tamim pulls it to the left of the fielder that had been brought in for the exact shot. Tamim would have hoped to clear the boundary, but it went straight to Pollard at the edge of the boundary.
fuller length on the off stump, the batsman stays on the crease and drops it with soft hands towards mid-on and pinches a single
short of length just outside off, beats the batsman who stood back in the crease
length ball on the pads, pushed towards midwicket for an easy single
short of length outside off, the batsman pushes it towards point off the back foot
short ball, but veering towards the leg side, tucked away towards fine leg for a single
length ball on the off stump, the batsman comes forward and drives it to the left of mid-on
crashed through point by Anamul! He was offered width outside off with a full delivery and he cashes in on it by smashing it off the front foot
another full delivery, closer to the stumps, driven straight to cover off the front foot
length ball on the off stump line, squares up the batsman as he defends it off the back foot
short of length outside off, the batsman stays in the crease and tries to cut it, but gets an under edge that goes to second slip
beaten with one which swings away from outside off as the batsman tried to play it from the crease
short of length on the off stump line, Naeem defends it off the back foot
short of length outside off, Naeem stays back and defends it to point
charges down the wicket and Russell sees that and bowls short. Luckily for Naeem, it takes a top edge and flies over the keeper's head
short of length on the body, the batsman tucks it towards square leg
another quick short one and Anamul was in no position for the pull, he took his eyes off the ball and the ball goes to the keeper
another short ball outside off, Anamul attempts the pull again and is nowhere near the ball
short of length on the off stump line, defended off the back foot
it is bowled outside off on a length and the batsman tries to smash it without any feet movement, gets beaten completely
another play and a miss! There is just no feet movement as he tries to smash it to the off side off a length delivery outside off
and another play and a miss. This one was a short of length delivery that left the batsman, Naeem just hands his bat at that one and is lucky not to get an edge

caught at short fine leg! The short ball does the job. This one was bowled on the body and Naeem tried to defend it awkwardly. The ball catches the shoulder of the bat and lobs up for Narine at short fine leg to take an easy catch. That wicket looked like it was just round the corner.
length ball in the channel outside off, moves a touch away, Mush comes forward and then lets it go
starts off with a bouncer, Anamul ducks under it this time
bowled in the channel outside off, Anamul leaves it alone
bowls it full and on the pads, the batsman gets hit on the pads as he misses his flicks, Russell appeals but that was going a touch down the leg side
length ball on the off stump, the batsman stays back and defends it down the pitch
how well was that timed! It was a full length delivery on the pads and the batsman flicks it in front of square and beats the fielder at deep square leg
short of length on the off stump line, defended down the pitch off the back foot
short of length on the pads, Mush plays it with soft hands towards square leg and calls for a single
flays at that one outside off, there was width available, but the batsman just struck it hard through covers without any feet movement
short of length on the body, pushed towards the right of mid-on off the back foot
short of length outside off, Mush stays back and steers it towards third man
short of length outside off, defends it off the back foot
short of length outside off, Anamul stays back and pushes that one towards cover, played that away from his body
length ball angling in from wide off the crease, pushed back to the bowler off the front foot
short ball on the body, defended off the back foot towards point
short of length on the body, tucked away to square leg for a single
short ball outside off, sails over the batsman who gets out of the way
short of length outside off, plays this towards deep square leg off the back foot
another short of length delivery on the body, dropped it with soft hands towards square leg
bowls it full, but wide outside off stump, left alone by the batsman
length ball outside off, moves a touch away, defended down the wicket
angles this one on to the off stump, but it is flicked through midwicket for a boundary
beaten outside off. It was a length delivery with a bit of width, Mush went for a drive and is beaten as the ball moves away
short of length outside off, defended towards mid-off off the back foot

fuller delivery outside off, and Mush drives it in the air back towards the bowler. Sammy stuck his left hand out but couldn't quite hold on to that one. That was hit very hard but it goes down as a drop
tosses it up outside off, defended towards point
flighted delivery outside off stump, the batsman comes forward and pushes it to cover
tossed up delivery on off and middle, turned toward midwicket
flighted delivery on the off stump, defended back to the bowler
pushes this one through and the batsman goes back and turns it to the leg side for a single
another flighted delivery, defended back down the pitch again
length ball on the off stump, Anamul defends it towards mid-on off the back foot
length ball outside off, and the batsman again tries to throw his bat at it without any feet movement. He gets an under edge and that was close to the stumps
short ball on the body, Anamul tries to pull it without his eyes on the ball, the ball takes a top-edge and goes to fine leg boundary
now he comes forward to a length delivery outside off, steers it to third-man
short of length outside off, Mush doesn't get any timing as he tries to cut this, hit straight to point
length ball on the off stump line, the batsman turns it to deep square leg with a roll of his wrists
tossed up on the middle stump line and Mush sweeps it hard to the deep square leg boundary
full and flighted just outside off, Mush plays it with the turn towards midwicket
flighted on the off stump line, tucked away to square leg
tossed up just outside off, Mush comes forward and defends it down the pitch
flighted delivery on the pads, Mush turns it to short fine leg
pushes this one through, a touch short but the batsman can't get it away
length ball on the middle stump, Anamul stays back and just punches it to the right of mid-on, who gets beaten by the pace in that shot and the ball goes to the boundary
short of length around off stump, Anamul stays back and again flicks it through wide mid-on for a couple
fuller delivery outside off, pushed to the point fielder off the front foot
short of length on the off stump line, punched to mid-on off the back foot
steered to point off the back foot as the delivery was short of length outside off
length delivery outside off, Anamul waits till the last moment and cuts it through the vacant slip area
full and flighted on the off stump line, driven down to long-on
flatter and shorter in length, turned away to square leg off the back foot
pushes this one through on the middle stump, tucked way to the fielder at square leg
tossed up on off stump, defended towards point
full and flighted on the middle stump line, Mush goes down for the sweep and hits it to deep backward square leg
flighted and slightly slow, defended off the front foot towards the off side
short of length on the middle stump line, the batsman goes back and turns it towards square leg for an easy single
length ball with a bit of width, the batsman stays back and opens the face to run it past a diving point for a single
fuller delivery with some width outside off, the batsman comes forward and drives it to deep cover
length ball on the stumps, defended towards mid-on off the back foot
strays on to the pads and the batsman helps it fine for a couple

beaten outside off! Anamul tries the same late cut that gave him a boundary two overs ago, but the ball moves away a touch and beats the bat. The keeper and the bowler go up in an appeal, but the umpire says not out
tossed up delivery outside off, defended down the pitch
short ball outside off, it was a bit quick too, Mush goes back and runs it past point using the pace on that for a boundary
flighted delivery on the middle stump and Mush gets under it and slams it over deep square leg with his sweep shot
flighted and full outside off, the batsman drives it to long on
shorter and flatter outside off, the batsman pushes it to point off the back foot
tossed up delivery on the off stump, driven straight to midwicket
short and wide, that has been cut hard over point, that races to the boundary faster than Bolt
short of length outside off, the batsman stays in the crease, hit hard towards wide mid-off without any feet movement
short of length outside off, the batsman stays back and steers it to point
back of length on the off stump, defended down the pitch off the back foot
it was not so short and it was outside off, the batsman goes back and pulls it through midwicket
and another freeby from Rampaul! This was short and wide, Mush cuts it hard over point for the third boundary of this over
flighted delivery outside off stump, defended off the front foot
short ball on the stumps, Anamul goes back and smashes it over midwicket for another boundary. The floodgates have opened
flighted delivery on off stump, defended down the pitch
pushes this one through on the pads, the batsman tickles it to the left of short fine leg
flighted delivery outside off, goes straight on and beats the batsman in his forward defence
full and flighted on the pads, tucked towards backward square leg for another single
starts off with a short one and that has been smashed towards deep midwicket
that is his first fifty in ODIs! He plays a fine late cut to run this quicker delivery down to third man
flighted delivery on the pads, tucked away to the leg side for an easy single
quicker ball outside off, defended off the back foot
slightly shorter delivery outside off, the batsman goes back and across and pushes this one through midwicket
flatter delivery on the pads, turned easily to deep square leg for another single
length delivery, pushed to cover off the back foot
length ball angling in towards the off stump, pushed to cover off the front foot
back of length on off stump, defended towards the off side
bowls it on the pads and the batsman glances it away to deep backward square leg
slower delivery on the off stump, driven with soft hands towards mid-on for a single
length delivery on the off stump, the batsman opens the face but can't beat the point fielder
flatter and shorter outside off, the batsman goes back and cuts it to short third man
gets down on his knee early and plays a premeditated paddle down to fine leg
tossed up delivery on the off stump, driven down the ground to long on
quicker delivery bowled on the pads, the batsman glances it to fine leg and runs for a quick second
short and wide, the batsman cuts it hard, but Smith makes a good stop at backward point
flatter delivery outside off, turns in a bit, pushed towards cover without any feet movement
short and wide, it is cut hard past point and the batsmen come back for a couple
short of length on the pads, tucked away to fine leg easily for a single
full delivery on the off stump, it is dug out to long-off
another attempted yorker on the middle stump, it is pushed to short midwicket
bowls length on the pads, and that gives Mush another easy single down to fine leg
short ball, but Smith's pace is to Anamul's liking. He gets under it and pulls it nicely through backward square leg for another boundary
pushed through on the middle, tucked away towards midwicket for a single
tossed up wide outside off, driven to cover off the front foot
slower and on the off  stump line, pushed to the left of cover fielder and the batsman take a quick single
faster delivery on the middle stump line, it hits the pads and goes to square leg. The umpire signals runs, but that didn't hit the bat
tossed up delivery on off stump, defended down the pitch
flighted delivery outside off, the batsman makes room and drives it hard, but straight to cover
slower length ball on the off stump, the batsman plays with soft hands towards the off side and calls for a quick run
short of length, on the off stump, the batsman stays back and opens the face very late to run the ball down to third-man
now Mush gets to his half-century with an easy glance to fine leg.
short of length on the middle stump, defended towards midwicket
short of length on the off stump, it is played very late and close to the body, towards third man
back of length angling in to the batsman, defended down the pitch
flighted delivery outside off, punched off the back foot towards deep extra cover
stays back to this flatter delivery and turns it to the right of fielder at midwicket
tossed up on the middle, driven down to long-on for another single
flighted delivery, pitches on middle and leg, turns down to the leg side and is called a wide
flighted delivery outside off, driven straight to cover
shorter and slower delivery, the batsman goes back and across and tucks it to deep square leg for another single
short of length outside off, punched towards mid-off and the batsmen pinch a quick single
length ball on the off stump, defended towards point
slower ball on off stump, the batsman stays back and defends it towards the off side
short of length on the off stump, defended off the back foot towards midwicket
slower ball, but too short, the batsman gets behind it and pulls it to deep square leg easily
short of length delivery on the pads, the batsman glides it to fine leg for another single
tossed up outside off and Mush plays his favourite sweep over midwicket this time
slowed and flighted on the off stump, the batsman defends it to the leg side and sneaks a single
full and quicker outside off, driven to mid-off
slower flighted delivery, defended off the front foot
tossed up delivery on off stump, the batsman defends it down the pitch
but he gets under this flighted ball this time and lifts it over mid-off for another boundary
back of length delivery outside off, it's steered towards third-man off the back foot
fuller length on the middle, driven to mid-on
back of length outside off, the batsman steers it on the off side but Sammy at point makes a diving stop
short of length delivery on the middle, the batsman goes back and turns it to deep square leg
fuller delivery on the middle, driven to mid-on who is standing a bit deep
loses direction as he bowls this one down the leg side
short of length just outside off stump, Anamul stays back and plays it down to third-man off the back foot
this one turns big from outside off stump, the batsman tried to cut it off the back foot, but the inside edge drops very close to the stumps
flatter delivery on the middle stump, defended to the leg side
bowls the one that goes the other way, the batsman stays back and pushes it to the right of midwicket

this could be close! It was a tossed up delivery outside off and the batsman attempted a scoop over the keeper, gets hit on the body and that goes towards short third-man, but the Anamul calls for a risky single and he has to dive full length as it is a direct hit. The frame saves the batsman as the benefit of the doubt goes to him
it's the carrom ball outside off, Anamul plays that from the crease and gets an outside edge to short third man
tossed up delivery outside off, played towards cover point for an easy single
short of length outside off, the batsman stays back and cuts it straight to point
short of length ball on the middle stump, that is bowled slightly slower and the batsman gets an inside that goes towards the off side after hitting the pads
back of length on the middle stump, turned away to deep backward square for a single
plays this short of length delivery outside off with soft hands towards point and calls for a quick single
there was width on offer and Rahim played that very late off the back foot and that beats the third-man fielder easily
on to the pads and that is easily turned to fine leg for a single
flatter deliver on the off stump, the batsman gets hit on the pads
tossed up delivery outside off, Mush comes forward and drives it to wide mid-on
flatter delivery on the off and middle, turned towards midwicket
flatter delivery on the off stump, it is the carrom ball, Anamul defends it off the back foot
pushes this one through on the off stump, the batsman goes deep in the crease and punches it to long on
plays a premeditated scoop from outside off, but misses and gets hit on the pads, the ball rolls past the keeper and the batsmen exchange ends
slower yorker outside off, defended back down the pitch
another slow length ball outside off, the batsman waits and just opens the face to run it to third-man
tries that slower yorker again, but this time it is a full toss and it is driven to long on
slower length ball on the middle, turned towards midwicket
bowls it slow and really full, driven down to long-on easily
short of length outside off, Anamul charges down the track but gets an outside edge that gives him another four
flatter delivery on the pads, nudged away to deep square leg for an easy single
bowls it flat and quicks outside off and beats the batsman as he tries to cut it from the crease
tossed up on the middle, that is helped to square leg with the turn
tossed up delivery, it turns and goes down the leg side and everyone misses that as it runs to the boundary
flat and quick on the off stump, gets some bounce on that, outside-edged towards short third man
and this turns down the leg side again to beat everyone for more extra runs
flighted outside off stump, the batsman comes forward to defend that
full and flighted, pushed wide of mid-off for another single
short of length, comes quickly into the batsman, who fends it on the leg side. There was a little mix-up but Mush is sent back in time
short and wide and that has been sent through backward point for another boundary
short ball on the body, Anamul goes for the pull but plays it unconvincingly towards deep backward square
another short ball on the body, the batsman fends it towards the off side awkwardly
a fast yorker on the middle stump line, the batsman digs out just in time
short ball has the batsman in a tangle as he plays a pull down to fine leg
keeps testing the batsman with another short ball, he plays another awkward pull down to fine leg
short of length on the body, fended off towards short fine leg and the keeper does the fielding
a belated appeal from the keeper. Another short one from the bowler, it is a touch slower. The batsman makes room and wanted to upper cut it, but the ball just went past the edge

caught at midwicket! Mush falls to the barrage of short deliveries. He makes room and then tries to pull it in front of square, but the ball hurried on to him and he doesn't get any timing. Hits it tamely to midwicket
short of length delivery on the off stump, defended to cover off the back foot
short ball, Anamul ducks under it this time
short of length on off stump, Anamul plays that late cut to third-man that he has been playing all day
another short ball and Nasir goes for a pull, but misses completely
short of length outside off, and now Nasir takes a leaf out of Anamul's book and plays it late to third man
slower ball which is bowled back of length, Anamul tries his favourite late cut but gets beaten
quick short one on the middle, plays it a touch convincingly to square leg this time and it takes him into the nineties
and the batsman continue to play ugly pull shots, this one is played down to deep square
short of length delivery on the middle, Nasir gets behind that and plays it down to deep backward square leg for a couple
back of length on the middle, defended down the pitch
bowls a slow bouncer, and Nasir bends his back to play the upper cut, but misses the ball. There is a stifled appeal from the bowler
a quick bouncer this time, the batsman tries to pull in but is no position to play that shot. The ball flies to the keeper
caught at cover! Another one falls to a short delivery! The batsman tries to turn it to square leg but gets a leading edge that lobs up to the off side. Chris Gayle gobbles up the dolly.
short ball to the new batsman, who unlike others, sways out of the line
short of length delivery on off stump, Anamul waits on the back foot and opens the face to run it down to third-man
short ball and the batsman attempts a pull. But he is in no control of that shot and the top edge drops safely short of the fielder at deep backward square leg
back of length delivery outside off, steered to third-man off the back foot
back of length on the middle stump, pushed towards cover off the back foot
another back of length delivery on the off stump, Mominul defends it towards point and the batsmen call for a quick single
back of length delivery, and Anamul plays that steer to the third man again. He is doing it with comfortable singles
bowls it full on the middle, turned straight to midwicket
flighted delivery on the off stump, steered towards point off the front foot
gets some big turn from outside off, the batsman gets cramped for room
the carrom ball outside off, beats the batsman in his back foot defence
now tosses it up, it is defended off the front foot
completes a maiden with a quicker one on off stump, that takes an outside edge to point
length ball on the pads, Mominul drives it through the on side with a lot of timing and he thought it was going for a boundary, but Pollard stopped it with his boot at the boundary
pushed towards point off the front foot
length delivery outside off, Anamul comes forward and drives but can't beat the man at cover
back of length slower ball outside off, punched towards deep cover off the back foot
slower delivery outside off, the batsman comes forward and drives it to long on
slower delivery on the middle, the batsman drives it back to the bowler, who gets a hand to it but palms it to mid-on allowing a single
tossed up outside off, the batsman comes forward and pushes it to cover
flatter delivery from round the wicket and Mominul waits and waits and opens the face to run it past gully for a boundary.
it's short and turns away from the batsman, who gets on top quickly and hits it hard to deep point, where Pollard prevents the boundary
bowls this one a touch slower, it grips the surface and turns past the outside edge
flatter this time, and Mominul cuts it nicely but can't beat the fielder at point
tossed up on the middle stump, the batsman comes forward and defends
bowls a yorker on the offstump, it's dug out with an open face to third-man
slower ball, driven to wide mid-on off the front foot

length ball on the middle, the batsman drops it down the pitch and sets off immediately. Mominul and Smith run towards the striker's end, Smith hitting the stumps after pushing the ball with his foot, but Mominul makes it in time
short of length, comes in with the angle, punched to mid-on
it's a fuller length this time and the batsman drives it hard to long-off for a another single
length ball down the leg side, the batsman gets a bat to that, but the keeper makes a diving save to prevent the boundary
flighted delivery on off stump, turns away and Mominul gets beaten as he tries to cut
flatter delivery on the off stump, defended down the pitch
quicker delivery with some room, the batsman finds point with his cut shot
tossed up delivery, the batsman paddles it to the left of short fine leg fielder and takes a single
flighted delivery around off stump, punched back to the bowler off the back foot
full and flighted outside off, carved straight to the fielder at point
short of length ball on off stump, the batsman inside edges it on to his pads. The ball rolls towards the off side
quick yorker on the off stump, squeezed straight to point
slower ball going down the leg side, the batsman misses his shot and gets hit on the pads. The ball rolls to the leg side
he gets under it nicely. It was a length ball and Mominul says thank you as he lifts it over cow corner for his first six.
length ball and that stayed very low, missed the stumps by a whisker..
short of length, angling in to the batsman, pushed to cover for a quick single
short of length on the off stump line, Mominul pulls it hard but finds the fielder at deep midwicket
short ball on the body, the batsman pulls it in a controlled fashion to deep square leg, move on to 99...
it's a wide down the leg side. Bangladesh wouldn't mind those..
short ball on the body, Mominul pulls it hard towards deep backward square leg for a single
plays it with soft hands to the off side and wanted a run straightaway, but that went to the fielder.
short ball is pulled towards deep square leg and it's the maiden century for Anamul in only his second game. Well played
short ball, it's fended towards short third-man for a single. Rampaul has overstepped too.
the batsman misses the free hit. It's a slower bouncer and Anamul made room but couldn't make contact with the ball.
short of length on the off stump, pushed towards point
fuller length delivery outside off and Anamul moves to the off side and flicks it down to deep backward square
a full-toss on the middle, Anamul makes room and hits it over cover, but doesn't time it very well
moves to the off side and picks up this short of length delivery over deep backward square leg for his first six
another full toss and Anamul makes room and smashes it over the mid-on fielder for a boundary
slower ball, Anamul is getting on with the game now, he makes room and scoops it over the cow-corner for the second six in this over
now Mominul joins in the party. It's a short delivery on the body and the batsman pulls it hard to the deep midwicket boundary

caught at deep point! It was a fuller length delivery outside off and Mominul wanted to send it over the long-on boundary, but he gets an outside edge which goes high up in the air over point. Pollard runs in from the boundary and takes a comfortable catch

caught at fine leg! Anamul falls trying to increase the scoring. It was a short of length delivery on the body, he got a top-edge as he goes for the pull, the ball is taken at the edge of the boundary and that brings an end to an excellent innings by the youngster
fuller length delivery on the off stump, played from the crease and the batsman gets an outside edge to the third-man boundary
gets another outside edge as he tries to make room this time, but it is cut-off by the third-man fielder this time
it's a full-toss, but it goes down the leg side
bowls a yorker, but it's down the leg side and the batsman helps it along to fine leg
quicker delivery, it has been hit to the moon by the batsman and it comes down over the deep midwicket boundary
more air miles for the ball, the batsman sends this one over the long-on boundary. Where were you earlier Mashrafe?
fast and full on the pads, it is squeezed to midwicket for a single
another quick delivery fired on the leg stump, the batsman gets a pad to that as he gets it down to fine leg
fast yorker on the pads, the batsman wanted to hit it out of the ground, misses the shot and gets hit on the back pad
tries to fire it down the leg side, but it is too wide and even the keeper can't stop it
bowls it full outside off, and the batsman can only dig it out for a single

inn2.comm: tossed up on the middle and leg, defended to the leg side
flighted delivery on the pads, turned towards square leg off the front foot
keeps it on that line on the pads, again turned to the leg side
pushes this one through on the off side, the batsman goes back and cuts it to point
bowls it down the leg side, but it catches the batsman's pads
flatter on the pads, this time Simmons is able to get it away to deep backward square leg
bowls it wide outside off, that swings further away
beats the bat with a short of length delivery outside off. Simmons doesn't get to the line of the ball and plays it inside the line
short and wide, the batsman punches it between point and cover off the backfoot. Anamul makes a diving stop
short of length on the stumps, defends it off the back foot
bounces from a length outside off, Gayle left that delivery but that was taken by the keeper over his head
short of a length delivery, it bounces upto chest high, defended down the pitch off the back foot
back of length on the pads, the batsman pushes it to wide mid-on for a single
flighted delivery wide outside off stump, left alone
tosses it up on the off stump line, Gayle comes forward and defends
flatter delivery on the off stump, the batsman defends it to the leg side
keeps it tight on the stumps, again defended to the leg side
flights this one just outside off, Gayle presents his bat
and bowls a maiden with another tossed up delivery on the middle which is defended to the leg side
fuller ball on the middle stump, Simmons finds the midwicket fielder with his on drive
short of a length delivery on off stump, doesn't bounce as much as anticipated, the batsman pushes it to mid-on off his back foot
short of length delivery on the off stump, Gayle wanted to punch it on the up, but gets an inside edge on to his body
back of length on the pads, Gayle makes some room but can't do much as he defends it back to the bowler off the back foot
quick short ball, Gayle tries to pull it from the crease, gets an under edge to the keeper. He had no idea where it went. He was looking towards the leg side, but the ball was back with the keeper
and another dot ball to Gayle. This one was a back of length delivery on the middle stump, Gayle punches it to mid-off

edged! and just past the first-slip. That is a drop. It was flighted outside off, and the batsman got a healthy edge. The fielder at slip only got a hand to it as he dived to his right, but fluffed a difficult chance
and he responds by charging down the track and slamming it over wide long-on for a big hit.
appeal for lbw now. It was a tossed up delivery on the middle stump and Simmons misses his sweep shot. That was very close

caught at mid-off! Simmons misery against Gazi ends. Simmons charged down again and was nowhere near the pitch of the delivery. He sends this high in the air but the ball travels only as far as mid-off
it is a flatter delivery outside off for the new man, and Bravo goes back and punches it through cover off the back foot to open his account
pushes this one down the leg side
flighted and full on the off and middle, Bravo defends it down the pitch
surprises Gayle with the bounce again. It got up from just back of length and hit the shoulder of Gayle's bat
back of length delivery on the middle stump, defended to cover off the front foot

makes room for this back of length delivery and crashes it back to the bowler, who had no time to get out of that. He is down and seems to have done some damage to his ankle. That was brutally hit. He immediately went to check if the bowler was ok.
no respite for the bowler as Gayle charges down and makes room, and hits this very very long over the sight screen
beaten outside off! He didn't move his feet at all and tried to run this down to third man but misses
makes room and charges down again, the bowlers bowls it short and on his body, but Gayle adjust and hits a forehand smash over midwicket
flights it on the off stump, nudged to the leg side
flatter delivery on the off stump, defended down the pitch off the front foot
fuller and flighted on the middle, Bravo tries to drive it to the leg side, but gets an outside edge to the off side
drives this one firmly off a length, but straight to cover
flighted delivery on off, defended down the pitch
on the pads, and Bravo fails to connect with his sweep shot, the ball hits the pads and goes to short fine leg
length ball on the off stump, Bravo drives it on the up, straight to the fielder at short cover
bowls it a touch slower outside off, the batsman adjusts by opening the face and running it down to third man
short of length outside off, Gayle now targets the short cover fielder, who is lucky not to get a hand to that

caught behind! Mashrafe has his revenge. Gayle charges down and the bowler bowls it a little short. The extra bounce on that means it hits the outside edge of Gayle's horizontal blade and goes to the keeper around chest high.
back of length delivery on the off stump, Samuels goes back and across and opens the face to run the ball down to third-man
slower length ball outside off, Bravo watches it go to the keeper with the angle
flatter delivery outside off, Marlon goes deep in the crease and pushes it to point
bowls it flat outside off, and Marlon gets beaten on his attempted cut shot
flighted on the middle stump, the batsman comes forward and drives it to long-on
tossed up on the middle stump, driven to long-off
flighted and full on the off stump, driven to cover
flighted delivery on the middle and leg line, Bravo flicks it to deep backward square for a couple
short of length delivery outside off, Samuels leaves it alone
short of length on the pads, Samuels stays in the crease and pushes that to midwicket
played towards point off the back foot
goes back to this short of length delivery outside off, and pushes it between point and gully, to the third-man for a single
short of length on the middle stump line, Bravo punches it straight down the ground, to mid-off for a quick single
back of length outside off, punched hard but straight to the cover fielder
flighted delivery on the middle stump, swept hard to deep backward square
loud shout for lbw off this arm ball, but that was going down leg
flatter delivery outside off, Samuels punches it off the back foot to deep cover
pushed through outside off, the batsman stays on the back foot and punches it to long-on
tossed up delivery, pushed back to the bowler
flighted outside off, the batsman gets to the pitch off the ball and drives it nicely through covers, beat the man at deep cover
length ball on the off, driven on the up to mid-off
bowls another length ball, a touch slower, on off stump, Bravo comes forward and drives it through cover
back of length on the middle and leg line, flicked away to deep square leg off the back foot easily
he punches this one off the back foot to deep cover off a short of length ball on the off stump line
short and with some width, Samuels punches it to deep cover for a single
slower ball on the off stump line, driven straight to mid-off
short ball, doesn't get up much, pulled away to deep square leg. The fielder hits the stumps from the deep and the ball ricochets for the batsmen to take a couple of overthrows.
short of length delivery on off stump, Bravo goes deep in the crease and cuts it to third man, where the fielder makes a complete mess of a regulation stop
length ball, Bravo plants his foot down and drives it on the up, but can't beat the fielder at cover
short ball outside off, Bravo doesn't get timing in his pull, hits it towards midwicket
loses direction as he bowls this length ball down the leg side. Perfect delivery to a right hander
short of length outside off, chops it back on the pitch off his inside edge as he tries to hit this towards cover
short and wide, Bravo slashes it over point, but there is a fielder at deep point to cut-off the boundary
flighted and full on the pads, driven to long-on easily
tossed up on off stump from over the wicket, defended towards the off side
flatter and a touch shorter outside off, the batsman punches it past point for a couple
flatter delivery on the off stump, punched back to the bowler
caught behind! He bowls this one flat and fast outside off and Marlon Samuels went back to punch it through off side, but gets a faint edge to the keeper.
flighted delivery on the off stump line, defended off the front foot
flatter outside off stump, defended back to the bowler
this one went straight with the arm and Bravo gets beaten as he plays inside the line
another flat delivery, defended down the pitch off the back foot
flat and a touch short, that allows Bravo to go back and cut it to deep point
bowls it flat, but wide down the leg side
a flighted arm ball and there is a loud appeal for lbw, it was very close but the umpire thinks otherwise

not this time, it is exactly similar delivery and Smith plays down the wrong line as he comes forward in defence. This time the gap between the bat and the pad was big enough to quell doubts. That would have hit the middle stump. But looks like that there was an inside edge. So Smith is unlucky as it appeared plumb to the naked eye
flighted outside off stump, pushed to point off the front foot
flighted and closer to the off stump, defended off the front foot
tossed up delivery, but it is wide and turns further away, the batsman punches it past cover for an easy single
flighted and full, driven to cover off the front foot
pushes this one through, Pollard goes back and defends to the off side
flatter delivery on the off and middle line, pushed to midwicket
flatter delivery on the off stump, defended back to the bowler
flighted and a touch slower outside off, the batsman opens the face and takes a single towards point
flighted delivery on the middle stump, Pollard pushes this to midwicket off the front foot
pulls the length back a bit, but Pollard comes forward and turns it towards square leg for a single
flatter on the middle, Bravo gets on top of that as he plays the sweep shot to deep backward square leg
flighted arm ball on the off stump line, the batsman wanted to blast it through covers, but gets an inside edge to deep midwicket
flighted and full on the middle and leg, Pollard gets his front foot out of the way and drives it to long-on
flighted ball with width outside off, the batsman wanted to drive it on the up, but gets an outside edge that goes all the way to the boundary
flatter delivery, closer to the stumps, defended to the off side off the front foot
flighted and full wide outside off, Bravo drives it hard back to the bowler, who gets a hand to it and prevents the single
pushed through outside off, punched to deep cover off the back foot
flighted delivery on the middle stump, pushed back to the bowler, who makes a partial stop but palms the ball towards midwicket
flighted delivery outside off, Pollard drives hard it and gets a single to long-off

caught behind! And another one bites the dust. It was flighted outside off and the batsman came forward to defend, but he played down the wrong line as he expected the ball to turn into him. The ball went on straight and took the edge. Mush juggled it a bit but caught it comfortably
tossed up on the middle stump line, defended off the front foot

another arm ball! And another one! It was tossed up outside off and the batsman came forward to defend it towards the off side, but played down the wrong line as the ball didn't turn and went through the gap between bat and pad to hit the off stump
tossed up delivery outside off, Sammy comes forward and drives it to long-off
flatter delivery, pushed through on the off stump line and it stays a bit low too as Pollard punches it to long-on off the back foot
flatter delivery, a touch short, but on the off stump, defended back to the bowler
floats this one up on the off and middle line, Pollard pushes it to midwicket
tossed up delivery on the off stump, defended off the front foot
flatter and on the pads, Pollard goes back and punches it to midwicket
another flat and short delivery outside off, the batsman goes back and punches it to long-off
flatter delivery, hits the pads but this was heading down the leg side
quicker delivery on the pads, it hits the pads and goes to short fine leg
slow and short on the off stump line, the batsman waits and punches it to deep cover
that kept a little low around the off stump, the batsman just got his bat down in time
and again, but this time Sammy gets it to mid-off and sets off for a quick single
short and wide, cut hard to deep point off the back foot
arm ball that goes straight through, defended back to the bowler off the back foot
flatter delivery, but that bounced from just short of length and Pollard was beaten in his back foot defence
flatter delivery on the middle, pushed back to the bowler off the front foot
slightly short and turns in to the batsman, who goes back in the crease and punches it to long-on
short and on the pads, turned to square leg
pushed through on the off and middle, defended down the pitch
some turn now, defended watchfully by the captain
flighted outside off stump, Pollard goes back and punched it to deep cover
flighted outside off, Sammy stays in the crease and pushes this to cover
slightly short and Sammy gets into the position quickly and easily clears the boundary at midwicket. That was just a short-arm jab
flatter delivery on the off stump, Sammy plays it to cover off the back foot
floats this one wide outside off, a bit quicker, the batsman let's it go
beats the batsman with another quicker one outside off. Sammy played that without much feet movement
flat and short on the middle and leg stump line, Pollard goes back and punches it to long-on
another flat and short of length delivery on the middle, punched to long-on off the back foot
draws the batsman forward with a flighted one, pushed to cover
pushes this one through outside off, the batsman goes back and punches it to long-on
flat and quick, on the stumps, defended off the back foot
flighted delivery outside off, pushed to wide long-off for a couple
short and wide, the batsman stays in the crease and pushes it to deep cover
flatter outside off, stays low too, left alone by the batsman
slow and short of length outside off, the batsman gets his timing wrong and hits it towards midwicket
full toss on the pads, it's driven to deep midwicket easily

caught at deep cover! Sammy falls into the trap. It was a flighted and full delivery wide outside off - close to the wide marker - and the batsman's eyes were lit up. He backed himself to clear the boundary as he went for that lofted drive but it went only as far as the fielder at deep cover, few metres inside the boundary.
and now Pollard plays a similar shot, but this one doesn't go very far fortunately for Pollard
flatter delivery on the middle stump, pushed towards long-on off that back foot
flatter delivery, bounces extra, defended off the back foot
beats him outside off with a quicker, flatter delivery as the batsman goes for a cut
flatter delivery, turns into the batsman, defended back to the bowler
on to the pads and that is turned away to square leg
flighted delivery on the off stump, Russell comes forward in defence
beats the batsman's drive with the one that goes straight on
flatter and on a length, the batsman goes back and pushes this easily to long-on
flighted delivery, the batsman comes forward to defend
flat and short, but on the stump, pushed to cover off the back foot
on the pads and it's turned toward square leg for a quick single
pushed through on the middle stump line, driven to wide long on off the back foot
flighted outside off, and the batsman plays inside the line of that and gets an edge past where the slip should have been
tossed up delivery on the middle, the batsman lifts it with the turn for a welcome boundary to deep square leg

Off stump takes a walk! Pollard stays back to this quicker one which comes in a bit after pitching. But the batsman plays inside the line while on his back foot and hears the sound of the rattle. That stayed a touch low too
another big shout for lbw!  It was a quicker delivery from round the stumps, hits the batsman over the knee roll while he is on his front foot
pushed down the leg side and it has been called a wide
flighted delivery on the middle stump line, defended back down the pitch
he drives this flighted delivery straight to cover
pushed to long-off easily by Russell
flighted on the middle and leg line, defended down the pitch
comes down the pitch, but misses his shot and gets hit on the pads
the ball is on the leg side, Narine gets hit on the pads and takes an extra
flighted on the off stump line, the batsman sweeps it to midwicket for a single
flighted delivery on the off stump line, driven to cover off the front foot
flight and turn, the batsman defends it to the leg side
flighted and it's a full toss outside off, the batsman can only push it to long-off
flat ball, comes on quick, pushed to the off side
tossed up on the off side, driven to long-off off the front foot
short and on the middle, Russell takes the advantage of that as he swings that over midwicket for a boundary
flighted on the off stump line, the batsman comes forward in defence
flighted delivery, drifts to the leg side and the batsman flicks it away fine on the leg side
tossed up on the off stump line, driven off the front foot to long-off
flatter delivery, the batsman goes back and punches it to deep cover for a single
full and flighted on the middle and leg, driven to wide long-on for a couple
cuts it fine on the off side and gets a boundary as a reward
goes down the leg side

at the striker's end! slow and flighted, on the off stump, the batsman dabs it to covers and sets off for a quick single. A good throw from the fielder at cover sends it in flat and on top of the stumps for Mush to take the bails off. And Andre Russell is short

caught at cover! No they can't. It was a flighted delivery on the off stump and Narine drives it in the air towards the off side and Tamim Iqbal flies full stretch and plucks this catch from nowhere. What a ripper!
